DOC.brief_title: Steady State Vestibular Evoked Myogenic Potentials
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : age 18 35 year auditory threshold less equal 20 dBHL , 0.5 8 kHz , interear frequency difference less equal 10 dB . Exclusion criterion : exposure occupational leisure noise ; otological surgery ; three ear infection within last year ; use ototoxic medication ; buzz ear , vertigo , dizziness cochlearvestibular symptom ; presence systemic alteration could contribute cochlearvestibular pathology , diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemias and/or hormonal alteration .
